## one() function

Extracts the objects from a single-row table. This is commonly needed when doing rollups that output a single row of stats.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function one(table: ColumnTable, transformer?: (d: any) => any): Record<string, any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  table | ColumnTable | table to extract row from |
|  transformer | (d: any) =&gt; any | <i>(Optional)</i> optional transform to apply to the row |

<b>Returns:</b>

Record&lt;string, any&gt;
